Gibson - 2016 Les Paul Standard 2016 Gibson Les Paul Standard flame top Amber finish. This one is in excellent condition and looks as if it was hardly ever played, We found a few small surface scratches and some small finish depressions that do not show up in photos. Overall there are no major visible dings , dents, or chips that we can find anywhere. Guitar features a modern weight relief mahogany body, bound and carved premium flame maple top, mahogany neck, rosewood fingerboard, acrylic trapezoid inlays, 1960's asymmetrical neck profile, Tone Pros locking Nashville bridge, tailpiece and Grover locking tuners. The tone of this fine guitar comes courtesy of the original Gibson Burstbucker Pro chrome covered humbuckers. The guitars electronics also feature coil tapping, phase and true bypass options for versatility and tonal clarity like you have never heard before! Ships complete with the original Gibson hard case with all tags and paperwork!
